text: Willem King gret Bundi stallere and Sawold sirefen and alle mine thegnes on Oxnefordecire freondlice.

And ice kithe eow that se half hide at Mersttune and alc thare thnga the thar to sebirad ligge into Westminstre, swa full and swa ford swa we det it formest hahte and thder inne bequath, and ic thas se uthe.

Nu bid ic that alc thare thnge the danen ut se is idon cume ongean in thas dages binnan sefen nihte the ths gewritt to eow comth that nan othe ne sth for tham ic nelle se thafian that ani man undo tha gife tha icc thider inn geunnen habbe.
